name: newline_scrolls_at_bottom
description: Newline at bottom row scrolls the grid up, making room for new content
comment: CUP(3,1) -> (2,0), print ABC at (2,0-2) cursor at (2,3), LF at bottom row scrolls grid up: old row 0 evicted, ABC now at (1,0-2), cursor at (2,3) (LF has no CR without LNM), print D at (2,3); cursor at (2,4)
